Description: Suck on anything that touches the lips
Turning the head when the cheek is touched
Fingers automatically grip anything that touches the palm of the hand
The toes will fan out and curl when the sole of the foot is stroked from heel to toe
Image: ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/bc/Babinski-newborn.jpg)^[[Image](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Babinski-newborn.jpg) by [Medicus of Borg](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:Medicus_of_Borg) is licensed under [CC BY-SA 3.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en)]

Description: A sudden noise or loss of support to the head and neck will cause infants to spread out their arms and legs then quickly contract the limbs inward
When lying on the back with the head to one side infants will extend the arm and leg on that side while flexing the limbs on the opposite side (looks like a fencer pose).
Legs move in stepping like motion when feet touch a smooth surface
